data.title: SMALL TOWN RAG
data.meta_description: Small Town Rag Canada is a Canadian clothing and apparel company based in Ontario, Canada and specializes in offering hoodies and t-shirts for small towns, villages, tiny rural and cottage communities in Canada as well as their other branded designs. They offer express post shipping included in their prices.
data.text:
Sorry folks, we will be closed until the new year due to the high provincial taxes we pay to ship to each province. We will re-work our budget and suppliers and will return in 2025.

You can always send me an email to SmallTownRag@gmail.com if you have any questions or are in need of customer service for past orders.

-- Robbie @ Small Town Rag Canada
